changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Add check constraint to topics.content_url to ensure it's either empty or a valid URL with a scheme
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE topics ADD CONSTRAINT chk_topics_content_url_format CHECK ( content_url IS NULL OR content_url = '' OR content_url ~ '^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9+.-]*://' );

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE topics DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS chk_topics_content_url_format;
